title: Trump’s False Claim About Opening Apple Plant in Texas
subtitle: Fact Check of Donald Trump opening Apple plant in Texas: President Donald Trump tried to take credit for opening a plant that’s been in business for years. He also tried to blame House Speaker Nancy Pelosi for closing Congress, but she didn’t.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
President Donald Trump tried to take credit on Wednesday, 10 November, for opening a plant that’s been in business for years.

He also tried to blame House Speaker Nancy Pelosi for closing Congress, but she didn’t.
